content.new: Hi, is there another way to dynamically change the properties of the boat in Gazebo? I tried using ‘rosservice call set\_link\_parameters’ and it updates the parameter field in Gazebo but the effect doesn’t actually take place in the simulation. Is this a plugin issue? Please give some advice on this. Thanks in advance.
content.old: Hi, is there a way to dynamically change the mass of the boat in Gazebo? I tried using ‘rosservice call set\_link\_parameters’ and it updates the parameter field in Gazebo but the effect doesn’t actually take place in the simulation. I know this because if I update the wamv urdf before starting the simulation with a large mass, it will sink. However when I use the service call, the wamv does not sink or change even though the parameter field says it has.
